liezl-maree.name: Liezl Maree
liezl-maree.bio: Engineer focused on computer vision and reinforcement learning. Previously worked on pose estimation software development with applications in neuroscience.

posts.title: Classification to Bitwise Representation: Derive a Solution Set for Weights and Biases
posts.summary: A guide on how to manually modify the output layer of a neural network to convert an image classification model into one that outputs a bitwise representation. This article covers the necessary steps, code examples, and considerations for deriving this transformation by-hand.

posts.title: Deep Learning for Pose Estimation: A Practical Guide
posts.summary: An in-depth exploration of modern pose estimation techniques, their mathematical foundations, and practical applications in robotics and computer vision. Learn how to implement state-of-the-art models and optimize them for real-world scenarios.

posts.title: Reinforcement Learning: From Theory to Practice
posts.summary: Understanding the fundamental concepts of reinforcement learning and how to apply them to real-world problems in robotics and control systems.

posts.title: Just a placeholder for now
posts.summary: This is just a placeholder for the time being, but I am actively writing my first article (after having coded up a blog template and semi-recklessly vibed lots of javascript/css yada yada yada). The link works of course, but no content is loaded.
